root.specsKey: Nikon Coolpix S6800 Point & Shoot Camera (Black)
4 sec (when Scene Mode is Set to Fireworks Show), 1/4000 sec (Maximum Speed During High-speed Continuous Shooting)
Data Transfer Protocol: MTP, PTP, HDMI Output: Can be Selected from Auto, 480p, 720p and 1080i

Focus Area Selecton: Face Priority, Center, Manual with 99 Focus Areas, Subject Tracking, Target Finding AF, Digital Zoom Magnification: 35 mm (135) Equivalent 1200 mm, Flash Control: TTL Auto Flash with Monitor Pre-flashes
9 Elements in 7 Groups (1 ED Lens Element)
50 cm (1 ft, 8 inch) - Infinity (W), 1.5 m (5 ft) - Infinity (T)

Single (Default Setting), Continuous H (The Frame Rate for Continuous Shooting is 9.4 fps and the Maximum Number of Continuous Shots is 7), Continuous L (The Frame Rate for Continuous Shooting is 2 fps and the Maximum Number of Continuous Shots 7), Pre-shooting Cache (The Frame Rate for Continuous Shooting 11 fps and the Maximum Number of Continuous Shots is 5, Maximum of Two Frames Captured in the Pre-shooting Cache), Continuous H: 120 fps (The Frame Rate for Continuous Shooting 120 fps and the Maximum Number of Continuous Shots is 50), Continuous H: 60 fps (The Frame Rate for Continuous Shooting 60 fps and the Maximum Number of Continuous Shots is 25), BSS (Best Shot Selector), Multi-shot 16

Scene Auto Selector, Scene (Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night Portrait, Party / Indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk / Dawn, Night Landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks Show, Black and White Copy, Backlighting, Easy Panorama, Pet Portrait), Special Effects, Smart Portrait, Auto
Matrix, Center-weighted (Digital Zoom Less than 2x), Spot (Digital Zoom 2x or More)

Arabic, Bengali, Bulgarian, Simplified Chinese, Chinese (Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Marathi, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese (European and Brazilian), Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

Vibration Reduction: Lens Shift (Still Pictures), Lens Shift and Electronic VR (Movies), Motion Blur Reduction (Still Picture), Tripod Socket: 1/4 (ISO 1222), Charging Time: 1 hr 50 min (when Using Charging AC Adapter EH-71P and when No Charge Remains), Still Pictures: 170 Shots when Using EN-EL19, Electronically Controlled ND Filter (-2 AV), Range: F3.3 - F6.6 Aperture 2 Steps, Movie (Actual Battery Life for Recording): 35 min when Using EN-EL19, Frame Coverage (Shooting Mode): 99% Horizontal and 99% Vertical (Compared to Actual Image), Frame Coverage (Playback Mode): 99% Horizontal and 99% Vertical (Compared to Actual Image), Communications Protocols: IEEE 802.11b: DBPSK/DQPSK/CCK, IEEE 802.11g: OFDM, IEEE 802.11n: OFDM, Range (Line of Sight): 10 m (11 yd), Operating Frequency: 2412 - 2462 MHz (1 - 11 Channels), Data Rates (Actual Measured Values): IEEE 802.11b: 5 Mbps, IEEE 802.11g: 20 Mbps, IEEE 802.11n: 20 Mbps, Security: WPA2, Infrastructure Access Protocols

Scene Auto Selector, Scene (Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night Portrait, Party / Indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk / Dawn, Night Landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks Show, Black and White Copy, Backlighting, Easy Panorama, Pet Portrait), Special Effects, Smart Portrait, Auto
File System: DCF, EXIF 2.3, DPOF Compliant
JPEG Sound Files (Voice Memo), Movies: MOV (Video: H.264 / MPEG-4 AVC)
145 g (with Battery and SD Memory Card)
2 years Nikon India Warranty and Free Transit Insurance.

Pros: Good image quality,zoom,screen resolution,lookCons: battery life,slow response for delete image and in between continous shots
Unpleasent experiance with Flipkart this time

I ordered this camera with Seller called "LOOT LO". I was suspicious with this seller name but I got confirmation from Flipkart saying it's a genuine seller.I ordered this camera but surprisingly somebody called flipkart and cancelled my order on my behalf “Note from flipkart.. Customer called and cancelled”. When I saw such emails and messages, I called customer care and this time I got it ordered by flipkart executive.almost the same time...I got a call from seller, who was located in Bangalore, saying all cameras got ruined due to heavy rain last night when I asked him to get in touch with flipkart and let flipkart people confirm it me. He became arrogant saying why I am ordering again and again.Seller again called flipkart and cancelled on my behalf. And also kept calling me not order again. I had to again call Flipkart, escalated it their senior managers, shared seller numbers then they changed the seller to WS Retails. Finally I got my product..I never thought of facing such hassle on Flipkart but don’t know why Flipkart is allowing fake sellers.It could be due to their monetary benefits but FlipKart is definitely losing it’s credibility.
Good camera in this price range
This camera is really good in this price range- Good quality pictures- Zoom is really nice- Good battery backupI am very satisfied with this camera, good point shoot camera .
Pros:- Affordable price, Excellent Image HD Quality and pixels, WiFi facility is added advantage...Finally my parents are happy after having this handy camera.
Excellent product for normal use. Picture quality is good. Flash can be auto or can be manually adjusted. Video quality is very good.
i can't say that its a good camera. its a normal camera...Its too much slow.Picture quality is also not upto the mark.battery backup is good.
Very nice Product is Good as this price. But flip kart delivery is a bit late as expected. Camera Quality is good compared to other products in market within this price

the main thing wen you buy a product here in flipkart is that u get it for a cheaper rate than in the stores...nikon coolpix is a osm camera which can be taken around and can click good picture ..it is a good product in all for this price tag
Features are gud..but picture quality is not so..like lack of real colour, burn picture appears sometimes after taking the pics. also stabilizer is not so good. blur pictures..
